short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily convert text on web pages to Noah Text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Noah Text® helps struggling readers gain confidence while reading. It allows readers to easily see sounds within words, helping to decode and enunciate difficult words while building reading skill. 

StrongReader is a tool to convert websites to the Noah Text® format. After getting the extension, click on the icon in your browser bar and create a free account or log in with an existing account. After logging in, the extension will auto-convert any text found on websites you visit into Noah Text. The automatic conversion can be enabled and disabled at will.
